artist: Artist: Joe Chiappetta; Publisher: Joe Chiappetta , North Riverside, Illinois
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, illustration of a nude, blue-skinned woman and an elongated blue car with "13" in green on the hood, on an abstract yellow and green swirled background; 64 pp.
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography; bound volume
title: Silly Daddy #13
